name: Risk factors for clients subjected to intimate partner violence or sexual assault
title: Risk factors for clients subjected to intimate partner violence or sexual assault
description: Gender-based violence risk factors relevant to the population. Risk-factors will be highly country-specific. The Input Options listed below are based on Health care for women subjected to intimate partner violence or sexual violence â€“ a clinical handbook (3)

element.short: Risk factors for clients subjected to intimate partner violence or sexual assault
element.comment: WHO does not recommend universal screening for violence of women attending health care. WHO does encourage health-care providers to raise the topic with women who have injuries or conditions that they suspect may be related to violence
